remarks: Rearrangement of 4 terms in a vector sum.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Feb-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvgcl.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvgcl.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
nvadd4 $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) /\ ( C e. X /\ D e. X ) ) -> ( ( A G B ) G ( C G D ) ) = ( ( A G C ) G ( B G D ) ) ) $.
